Instance.description: Interaction for a pregnant sim to give birth on a surgery table.

TunableList.name: _loot_per_baby
TunableList.description: Loot that will be applied when a baby is born to a non NPC Sim. Actor will be the mom and TargetSim will be the sim_info of the baby. This will work for multiple babies as each loot will be applied to each baby sim info. None of these loots will be applied to a baby born to an NPC Sim.

Tunable.name: after_delivery_interaction
Tunable.description: The interaction to push on the Sim after delivering a baby at the hospital.

Tunable.name: bassinet_slot_type
Tunable.description: SlotType used to place the bassinet when it is created.

Tunable.name: bassinet_to_use
Tunable.description: Bassinet with Baby object definition id.

TunableTuple.name: destroy_baby_in_bassinet_vfx
TunableTuple.description: The VFX to play when the baby is being destroyed during an NPC birth sequence.

Tunable.name: effect_name
Tunable.description: The name of the effect to play.

TunableVariant.name: joint_name
TunableVariant.description: Specify if the visual effect is attached to a slot and, if so, which slot.

Tunable.name: Slot
Tunable.description: The name of the slot this effect is attached to.

Tunable.name: play_immediate
Tunable.description: If checked, this effect will be triggered immediately, nothing will block. ex. VFX will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

TunableEnum.name: surgery_table_participant_type
TunableEnum.description: A reference to the ParticipantType that the surgery table will be in this interaction.
